Name: Planned Relocation
Description: Use this item to move your city to another location.

Name: All Tasks Chance
Description: Use this item to refresh your all Specialist tasks.

Name: Specialist's Chance
Description: Use this item to refresh a Specialist's tasks.

Name: Player Tree Reset
Description: Use this item to reset your player tree.

Name: Rename Compound
Description: Use this item to rename your compound.

Name: Mission Recall
Description: Use this item to recall an outgoing mission.
